mutants.code:
def who_drinks_nth_cola(n: int) -> str:
    names = ['Sheldon', 'Leonard', 'Penny', 'Rajesh', 'Howard']
    i = 2
    val = 5
    while n > val:
        if i % 2 == 0 or i == 1:
            n = n - 5 * i
            val = 2 * val
        i = 2 * i
    index = (n - 1) // i
    return names[index]

    return names[index]

    index = (n - 1) // i
